articles.description: The 48-year-old Scot says doctors have told him he has between two and four years to live.

articles.description: Will Young and Rachin Ravindra guide New Zealand to an eight-wicket victory in Bengaluru - their first Test win in India since 1988.

articles.description: Major League Soccer side Inter Miami are named as the latest addition to the Fifa Club World Cup in 2025.

articles.description: The New York Yankees secure their place in the World Series for the first time since 2009 by beating the Cleveland Guardians 4-1 in their best-of-seven American League Championship series final.
articles.title: New York Yankees beat Cleveland Guardians to reach first World Series since 2009

articles.description: Just eight games into the Premier League season and Arsenal have already had three players sent off - but just how costly could it be?
